document.title: Unbounded operators in a Hilbert space and the Trotter product formula

para.p:
Let
H

⟨ ⋅ , ⋅ ⟩

The following is the spectral theorem for self-adjoint operators. 11 11 footnote 11 Walter Rudin, Functional Analysis, second ed., p. 368, Theorem 13.30.
